verses.name: Judges 13:16
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord said unto Manoah, Though thou detain me, I will not eat of thy bread: and if thou wilt offer a burnt offering, thou must offer it unto the Lord. For Manoah knew not that he was an angel of the Lord.

verses.name: Judges 13:17
verses.text: And Manoah said unto the angel of the Lord, What is thy name, that when thy sayings come to pass we may do thee honour?

verses.name: Judges 13:18
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord said unto him, Why askest thou thus after my name, seeing it is secret?
